golden_diagnosis: Neonatal Marfan syndrome,Marfan syndrome,马方综合征/Marfan syndrome; MFS/Marfan syndrome,马方综合征/Marfan syndrome; MFS/Marfan syndrome
predict_diagnosis:
1. Marfan syndrome
2. Neonatal Marfan syndrome
3. Ehlers-Danlos syndrome (types I and II)
4. Scoliosis associated with vertebral malformation
5. Kyphosis-related spinal deformity
6. Spinal muscular atrophy
7. Spinocerebellar ataxia
8. Myopathy due to genetic mutations
9. Inflammatory arthritis (e.g., rheumatoid arthritis)
10. Osteogenesis imperfecta
